task.en: Open the project "Portrait Faces" in iMovie, then import all jpg images from "Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Faces" to directly under the project.
task.zh: 在iMovie剪辑中打开名为Portrait Faces的项目，并从"Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Faces"导入所有jpg图片到项目中。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/ && osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Portrait Gallery/Original Media/0001_03.jpg" ] && [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Portrait Gallery/Original Media/0002_01.jpg" ] && [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Portrait Gallery/Original Media/0003_01.jpg" ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Portrait\ Gallery/Original\ Media -type f -name "*.jpg" | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Portrait\ Gallery/Original\ Media -type f -name "*.jpg" | wc -l) -ge 1 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Portrait\ Gallery/Original\ Media/Faces -type f -name "*.jpg" | wc -l) -ge 3 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Portrait\ Gallery/Original\ Media/Faces -type f -name "*.jpg" | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(find /Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie\ Library.imovielibrary/Portrait\ Gallery/Original\ Media/Faces -type f -name "*.jpg" | wc -l) -ge 1 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
